abstract: Taxpayers are very likely to feel quite a pinch on the securities the Federal Reserve accepted as part of JPMorgan Chase‘s takeover of Bear Stearns, The New York Post reported citing a report by a hedge fund that is an investor in JPMorgan.
lead_paragraph: Taxpayers are very likely to feel quite a pinch on the securities the Federal Reserve accepted as part of JPMorgan Chase‘s takeover of Bear Stearns, The New York Post reported citing a report by a hedge fund that is an investor in JPMorgan.

headline.main: Bear Stearns Buyout Could Hit Taxpayers, Report
